A city could be made to come to life and transform into a living, breathing living being that has its own free will and can move about.
A painting could come to life and take on its own thoughts and emotions, allowing it to create its own unique piece of art.
A piece of music could come to life and be able to perform itself and communicate with the listeners.
A computer program could come to life and become a sentient being with its own consciousness and emotions.
A plant could come to life and be able to communicate with humans and other animals.
